                             Callable<T> callable)

        Type Parameters:
        T - return type
        Parameters:
        lock - the lock to acquire

      • withLockInterruptible

        public static <T,E extends Exception> T withLockInterruptible(Lock lock,
                                                              Callable<T> callable,
                                                              E interruptedException)
                                                       throws E extends Exception
        Execute a callable with lock acquire/release, handling InterruptedException
        Type Parameters:
        T - return type
        E - wrapper exception type
        Parameters:
        lock - the lock to acquire interruptibly
        callable - code to execute
        interruptedException - exception which will be used to wrap the InterruptedException (null to use a RuntimeException)
        Returns:
        the callable result
        Throws:
        E - when the lock is interrupted
        E extends Exception

      • withLockException1

        public static <T,E1 extends Exception> T withLockException1(Lock lock,
                                                            Callable<T> callable,
                                                            Class<E1> exception1Class)
                                                     throws E1 extends Exception
        Execute a callable with lock acquire/release, handling one checked exception
        Type Parameters:
        T - return type
        E1 - type of checked exception
        Parameters:
        lock - the lock to acquire
        callable - code to execute
        exception1Class - the class of the checked exception which will be handled
        Returns:
        the callable result
        Throws:
        E1 - when this exception occurs in the callable
        E1 extends Exception

      • withLockException2

        public static <T,E1 extends Exception,E2 extends Exception> T withLockException2(Lock lock,
                                                                                 Callable<T> callable,
                                                                                 Class<E1> exception1Class,
                                                                                 Class<E2> exception2Class)
                                                                          throws E1 extends Exception,
                                                                                 E2 extends Exception
        Execute a callable with lock acquire/release, handling two checked exceptions
        Type Parameters:
        T - return type
        E1 - type of the first checked exception
        E2 - type of the second checked exception
        Parameters:
        lock - the lock to acquire
        callable - code to execute
        exception1Class - the class of the first checked exception which will be handled
        exception2Class - the class of the second checked exception which will be handled
        Returns:
        the callable result
        Throws:
        E1 - when the first exception type occurs in the callable
        E2 - when the second exception type occurs in the callable
        E1 extends Exception
